welcome.title: New Bogus Joined
welcome.1: :tada: Welcome to **{{ server }}** <@{{ userId }}>! Feel free to leave now. Enjoy losing your braincells.
welcome.2: :tada: Hey there, <@{{ userId }}>! Welcome to **{{ server }}**! Dive into our degeneracy.
welcome.3: :tada: Welcome to **{{ server }}**, <@{{ userId }}>! You have no power here.
welcome.4: :tada: Hey <@{{ userId }}>! Welcome to **{{ server }}**! You are about to hear every dumbshit in existence.
welcome.5: :tada: Welcome to **{{ server }}**, <@{{ userId }}>! Are you ready to lose your every game?
welcome.7: :tada: Hey <@{{ userId }}>, welcome! Need help? Good luck!
welcome.8: :tada: Welcome, <@{{ userId }}>! Remember, no hand-holding here.
welcome.9: :tada: Welcome to **{{ server }}**, <@{{ userId }}>! fend for your own shit.
welcome.10: :tada: Hello, <@{{ userId }}>! Welcome to **{{ server }}**! We guarantee you a very stressful experience.

leave.title: Graduated from Bogus
leave.message: :tada: <@{{ userId }}> has officially graduated from **{{ server }}**, a moment of congratulations!

reply.no_permission_to_assign_role: You don't have permission to assign a role!
